entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High zero except plus 4 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny except mainly cloudy along parts of the coast. Fog along parts of the coast early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero except plus 4 inland. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7 except minus 11 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 7 except minus 11 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
